title: SOL INVICTO (DEFTONES, CYPRESS HILL, Etc.) Streams Crushing New EP
description: Sol Invicto, the project formed by producer and guitarist Richie Londres, Stephen Carpenter (Deftones), and Eric Bobo (Cypress Hill), is now streaming their debut EP Loosely Aware and it's a rager. I mean yeah, it's […]
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Sol Invicto, the project formed by producer and guitarist Richie Londres, Stephen Carpenter (Deftones), and Eric Bobo (Cypress Hill), is now streaming their debut EP Loosely Aware and it's a rager. I mean yeah, it's three tracks, but this thing is absolutely going to steamroll you into next week.
text: Sol Invicto, the project formed by producer and guitarist Richie Londres, Stephen Carpenter (Deftones), and Eric Bobo (Cypress Hill), is now streaming their debut EP Loosely Aware and it's a rager. I mean yeah, it's three tracks, but this thing is absolutely going to steamroll you into next week. Loosely Aware also features bassist James Leech and drummer Dan Foord (SikTh). Because if you need some of that angular heaviness in your life, you clearly call Foord. Loosely Aware was produced by Londres, arranged and edited by Londres and Foord, and recorded by Sara Killion (Metallica). Loosely Aware was also mixed by Adam Nolly Getgood and mastered by Jaime Gomez Arellano of Orgone Studios. Loosely Aware is available here on Bandcamp. Want More Metal? html:
Sol Invicto, the project formed by producer and guitarist Richie Londres, Stephen Carpenter (Deftones), and Eric Bobo (Cypress Hill), is now streaming their debut EP Loosely Aware and it's a rager. I mean yeah, it's three tracks, but this thing is absolutely going to steamroll you into next week.

Loosely Aware also features bassist James Leech and drummer Dan Foord (SikTh). Because if you need some of that angular heaviness in your life, you clearly call Foord. Loosely Aware was produced by Londres, arranged and edited by Londres and Foord, and recorded by Sara Killion (Metallica). Loosely Aware was also mixed by Adam Nolly Getgood and mastered by Jaime Gomez Arellano of Orgone Studios. Loosely Aware is available here on Bandcamp.
